<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Smoldering Leopard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2008)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 44</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Resistances**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 5

**Weaknesses**
good 3

**Aura of Smoke** 10 feet. Every creature within the aura is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4); smoldering leopards can see through this concealment.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d10+3 piercing plus 1d4 fire and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing plus 1d4 fire

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The smoldering leopard Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the leopard began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after making this ability's Strike.

**Scorching Maul** <actions string="Single Action" />  The smoldering leopard makes two claw Strikes against a creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). A creature hit by both claw Strikes also takes 1d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Both attacks count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks are made.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The smoldering leopard deals an extra 1d4 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Smoldering Leopard
